text: geudeul-ege ileudoe cheonjiui modeun geos-i nuguege soghayeo issneunyo ileudoe geugeos-eun hananim-ui geos-imyeo geubun seuseuloleul jabiham-eulo dusyeoss-eumyeo simpan-ui nal neohuideul-eul moidolog hani ineun uisimhal ba eobsda hayeo la geulaedo geudeul-ui yeonghon-eul ilh-eun jadeul-eun midji anihalyeo hadeola
